document_data.name: The Art of Waging War
document_data.author: [[Bartholemew G. Blazencrow]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''The Art of Waging War''''' was a military [[book|work]] penned by General [[Bartholemew G. Blazencrow]] sometime before the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The book was bound in hide [[dyed]] red.
document_data.History: A copy of ''The Art of Waging War'' was kept in the library of [[Zerith Hold]], [[Lord Purdun]]'s stronghold in the city of [[Duhlnarim]] in [[Erlkazar]] in the {{YearlinkName|1369}}.
